icon_style.CRITICAL: ONLY ONE SYMBOLIC ICON. Simple, bold, instantly readable. No realistic detail or secondary elements.

geometry.proportions: 1:1 canvas, icon fills 60-70% of frame with breathing room

composition.element_count: exactly 1 symbolic icon - simplified representation, not realistic object
composition.spatial_depth: minimal depth - flat to slightly dimensional
composition.scale_consistency: all tab icons must have identical visual weight

lighting.type: soft even lighting with subtle form definition
lighting.contrast: medium - enough to define form without harsh shadows

textures.material_finish: smooth, clean surfaces - minimal texture noise
textures.detail_level: bold shapes only - no fine detail that disappears at small sizes

render_quality.edge_definition: clean, bold edges - no fuzzy boundaries

color_palette.tone: vibrant but cohesive across the tab set
color_palette.color_variety: each tab should have a distinct but harmonious color
color_palette.usage: bold primary color with minimal accents

icon_behavior.consistency: all tabs must feel like they belong together

constraints.no_fine_detail: no details that vanish at small sizes
constraints.uniform_weight: all tab icons must have similar visual density

ui_validation.tab_bar_test: looks balanced next to other tab icons
ui_validation.active_inactive: works in both colored and grey states
